comments.comment: One of the bad news we have heard today. Police report was mentioned she was taken drugs but unfortunately hospital report was mentioned not taken drugs. This is our people GODS real life... Innocent peoples in our country, this is time to worship your GMOA GODS... Also this is time to GMOA to strike to release their innocent consultant..

How do you know police is telling the truth? Sri Lankan police will do anything since it is a police officer who has died. If it is a layman they would not say the doctor is drunk, most likely they will say the deceased is drunk. This is the Sr Lanka Police man! They can rig any evidence as they wish!
GMOA this is the time for show ur true spirit to the innocent family. Open a scholarship fund for kids and contribute generously.

As a specialist doctor, she can help them in many ways rather than giving out money to help them get out of the woods.
